properties.Observatio: The anicut is in good condition. There is 7 openings (W=1.4m, H=1.2m), but no timber planks. However, due to erosion of the Abegoda oya, the initial part of the canal has been completely destroyed. 15 acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.

properties.Observatio: This canal, which used to be an earthen canal, has now been destroyed. However, water is currently being obtained for cultivations using PVC pipes. 8 acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.

properties.Observatio: This canal is a sub-canal of Mathetilla main canal. Although the canal was constructed using RRM, it is currently in a very delapidated condition. 12 acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.
